title: 权限组的问题！！！！！！！！！
author: 神-龙
txt_content:
怎么给一个权限组所有的ESS插件权限？？？？
怎么给一个权限组使用QS插件的权限？？？？

replies.author: tangyulei
replies.txt_content:
mangaddp builder quickshop.use
mangaddp builder quickshop.create.buy
mangaddp builder quickshop.create.double 
mangaddp builder quickshop.create.changeprice
mangaddp builder quickshop.bypass.ItemID
mangaddp builder quickshop.find
就行了
op本来就有所有的ess权限

replies.author: 神-龙
replies.txt_content:
tangyulei 发表于 2015-11-1 13:07
mangaddp builder quickshop.use
mangaddp builder quickshop.create.buy
mangaddp builder quickshop.crea ...
怎么给玩家所有的ESS权限！！！！！！！！
